alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 8:14AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL IBERIA...ST. MARY AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. MARTIN PARISHES THROUGH 900 AM CST... At 814 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Bayou Sorrel to 17 miles south of Cypremort Point. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgan City, Franklin, Patterson, Berwick, Bayou Vista, Stephensville, Burns Point, Belle River, Baldwin, Ellerslie, Patterson Memorial Airport, Amelia, Bayou Geneve, Charenton, Pierre Part, and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary
